title: Sentinels: The Grand Design: Omnibus 1
description: Fate has brought these diverse people heroes and villains, aliens and androids, showboats, students and government agents. Somehow they must confront and defeat the cosmic menaces converging upon Earth--without killing each other first! Here are the first three novels from Van Allen Plexicoâ€™s epic superhero/space opera saga in one omnibus volume, introducing the Sentinels and their deadliest foes. Contains "When Strikes the Warlord," "A Distant Star," and "Apocalypse Rising." Complete with fifteen full-page interior illustrations by Chris Kohler.
author: Van Allen Plexico
